cite.text: Lucchi, Aur√©lien, et al. 'Supervoxel-based segmentation of mitochondria in em image stacks with learned shape features.' IEEE transactions on medical imaging 31.2 (2011): 474-486.
Casser, Vincent, et al. 'Fast mitochondria detection for connectomics.' Medical Imaging with Deep Learning. PMLR, 2020

rdf_content.description: This dataset consists of segmented mitochondria images originally created by EPFL - CVLAB. However, it has been updated and re-annotated by three experts in neuroscience and biology, commonly referred to as Lucchi++. The dataset represents a 5x5x5¬µm section from the CA1 hippocampus region of the brain, with a volume of 1065x2048x1536. Each voxel has an approximate resolution of 5x5x5nm.
rdf_content.name: Lucchi++
